server.persistence.dao

Class UserDAOInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.persistence.dao.UserDAOInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DAOInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NonrelationalUserDAO, RelationalUserDAO

    public abstract class UserDAOInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements DAOInterface
    Parent class to determine what a DAO for a User needs to implement.
    Author:
    raulvillalpando

    • Method Detail

      • saveUser

        public abstract boolean saveUser(User user)
        Update or save the state of a user.
        Parameters:
        user - User that contains the ID and everything to save or update
        Returns:
        True if the User got updated successfully, False otherwise.

      • getUser

        public abstract User getUser(int id)
        Get an existing user by ID
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the existing user.
        Returns:
        The user specified by the ID, null if it doesn't exist.

      • listUsers

        public abstract java.util.List<User> listUsers()
        List all the registered users.
        Returns:
        A list of all the existing users.

      • register

        public abstract boolean register(java.lang.String username,
               java.lang.String password)
        Register a user if the user doesn't exist already
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the new user.
        password - The password of the new user.
        Returns:
        True if the user was created and registered correctly, False otherwise.
